attributes.action: Allow misled Leave voters to withdraw their votes on the EU referendum.
attributes.background: The 51.8% are angry. Many used their vote as a protest, many more believed the politicians who seemed to have a plan, more were misled by false claims from politicians and media. There is no plan. The hateful minority have misled the UK to the brink of disaster. Let the people reclaim their votes!

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
